data.title: Jordan Water Model (JWM)
data.meta_description: The Jordan Water Model (JWM) is a multi-agent, hydrologic-economic model of Jordan's national water system. The JWM-T extension enables tanker water market analyses. The JWM and JWM-T were develope...
